Class ColorPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.qwirkle.common.tiles.ColorPattern

    public class ColorPattern
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pattern
    A type of Pattern consisting of colors.

        public ColorPattern(Color color)
        Creates a CollorPattern object. It consists of tiles with the same color but different shapes.
